title: Whale Shark Watching in Oslob
highlights: Experience an unforgettable adventure as you swim alongside the majestic whale sharks in Oslob.
get: Boat transfer to the whale shark area
expect: Stunning underwater views of whale sharks.
Option to take photos and videos underwater
bestTime: Early morning (6 AM - 9 AM) for fewer crowds

faq.question: Do I need to know how to swim?
faq.answer: No, life vests are provided for all participants.

faq.question: Can I touch the whale sharks?
faq.answer: No, touching is strictly prohibited to protect marine life.

faq.question: Are there age restrictions?
faq.answer: Kids above 6 years old are allowed with parental guidance.

faq.question: Is transportation included?
faq.answer: No, but we offer transport services at an additional cost.

faq.question: Do I need to bring my own snorkeling gear?
faq.answer: No, snorkeling gear is provided.

title: Taal Volcano Trekking Adventure
highlights: Hike up the world’s smallest active volcano and enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of Taal Lake.
expect: A moderate-level hike with scenic landscapes
Possible steam vents along the trail
A stunning view of the crater lake
bestTime: December to March for the best climate

faq.question: Is the trek beginner-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes, but some steep parts may require extra effort.

faq.question: Can I bring my own snacks?
faq.answer: Yes, but avoid littering on the trail.

faq.question: Is there a boat ride involved?
faq.answer: Yes, the package includes a short boat ride to the island.

faq.question: Are pets allowed?
faq.answer: No, pets are not allowed due to safety concerns.

faq.question: What should I wear?
faq.answer: Comfortable hiking clothes and sturdy footwear.

title: Island Hopping in El Nido
highlights: Explore the stunning lagoons, hidden beaches, and limestone cliffs of El Nido through an exciting island-hopping adventure.
expect: Stunning white-sand beaches and crystal-clear waters

faq.question: Are kids allowed?
faq.answer: Yes, but must be accompanied by an adult.

faq.question: Is lunch included?
faq.answer: Yes, a buffet-style lunch is provided.

faq.question: Can I rent a private boat?
faq.answer: Yes, private tours are available at an additional cost.

faq.question: Do I need to bring my own snorkeling gear?
faq.answer: No, snorkeling gear is included.

faq.question: What happens in case of bad weather?
faq.answer: The tour may be rescheduled or refunded.

title: Toyota Fortuner 2024 Rental
highlights: Travel in style and comfort with our Toyota Fortuner 2024, a spacious SUV perfect for road trips and city drives.

faq.question: Is fuel included in the rental?
faq.answer: No, fuel is not included.

faq.question: Do you provide a driver?
faq.answer: Yes, with an additional fee.

faq.question: Can I take the car to other provinces?
faq.answer: Yes, but with prior approval.

faq.question: Is there a deposit required?
faq.answer: Yes, a refundable deposit applies.

faq.question: Are pets allowed?
faq.answer: Only in a carrier.

title: Nissan Urvan Premium 2023 Rental
highlights: A spacious and comfortable van perfect for group travel, corporate trips, or family outings.

faq.question: Is there a mileage limit?
faq.answer: Yes, 200 km per day. Excess mileage will incur additional charges.

faq.question: Do you offer airport pick-up?
faq.answer: Yes, with prior booking.

faq.question: Can we request a tour guide?
faq.answer: Yes, tour guides are available upon request.

faq.question: Is insurance included?
faq.answer: Yes, but limited to third-party liability.

faq.question: Do you allow long-term rentals?
faq.answer: Yes, special rates apply for long-term rentals.

title: Honda Click 160 Scooter Rental
highlights: Explore Boracay at your own pace with a fuel-efficient and easy-to-drive Honda Click 160 scooter.

faq.question: Do I need a license to rent?
faq.answer: Yes, a valid driver’s license is required.

faq.question: Is a helmet provided?
faq.answer: Yes, two helmets are included.

faq.question: Can I take the scooter outside Boracay?
faq.answer: No, rentals are only valid within Boracay.

faq.question: Is there a deposit required?
faq.answer: Yes, a refundable deposit applies.

faq.question: Do you offer guided tours?
faq.answer: Yes, optional guided tours are available.

title: The Bellevue Resort
highlights: A luxurious beachfront resort offering world-class amenities and breathtaking ocean views.

faq.question: Is airport transfer included?
faq.answer: Yes, complimentary airport transfers are available.

faq.question: Do you have free breakfast?
faq.answer: Yes, daily breakfast is included.

faq.question: Is there a pool?
faq.answer: Yes, the resort has an infinity pool.

faq.question: Are pets allowed?
faq.answer: No, pets are not allowed.

faq.question: Is there Wi-Fi in the rooms?
faq.answer: Yes, free high-speed Wi-Fi is available.

title: Seda Lio Resort
highlights: A modern beachfront resort in El Nido, offering luxurious accommodations with stunning sunset views.

faq.question: Is there a bar in the hotel?
faq.answer: Yes, there is a beachfront bar.

faq.question: Do rooms have air conditioning?
faq.answer: Yes, all rooms are fully air-conditioned.

faq.question: Can I book island-hopping tours from the hotel?
faq.answer: Yes, the concierge can arrange tours.

faq.question: Is breakfast included?
faq.answer: Yes, a buffet breakfast is provided.

faq.question: Is there parking available?
faq.answer: Yes, free parking is available for guests.

title: The Henry Hotel Manila
highlights: A charming boutique hotel in Manila offering a mix of classic and contemporary Filipino design.

faq.question: Is there an in-house restaurant?
faq.answer: Yes, The Henry Café serves local and international dishes.

faq.question: Do rooms have a minibar?
faq.answer: Yes, each room has a stocked minibar.

faq.question: Is smoking allowed in the rooms?
faq.answer: No, all rooms are non-smoking.

faq.question: Is there a gym?
faq.answer: No, but there is a swimming pool.

faq.question: Do you offer laundry service?
faq.answer: Yes, laundry services are available.

title: Boracay Summer Beach Festival
highlights: A vibrant summer festival featuring live music, beach games, and local food stalls in Boracay.

faq.question: Is food included in the ticket?
faq.answer: No, but food stalls are available.

faq.question: Can I bring my own drinks?
faq.answer: No, outside drinks are not allowed.

faq.question: Is there a dress code?
faq.answer: Casual beachwear is recommended.

faq.question: Are kids allowed?
faq.answer: No, this event is 18+.

faq.question: Is re-entry allowed?
faq.answer: No, single-entry only.

title: Sinulog Grand Street Parade
highlights: Join Cebu’s biggest festival, the Sinulog Grand Parade, celebrating culture and devotion with colorful street dances and lively performances.

faq.question: Is the event free to watch?
faq.answer: Yes, but VIP seating and guided tours require a ticket.

faq.question: Can I participate in the street dancing?
faq.answer: Yes, some areas allow public participation.

faq.question: What should I wear?
faq.answer: Comfortable clothes and walking shoes.

faq.question: Is the event family-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes, but expect large crowds.

faq.question: Are food and drinks allowed?
faq.answer: Yes, but food stalls are available throughout the event.

title: Manila Food & Wine Expo
price: ₱3,000 for a 3-day pass / ₱1,200 for a single-day ticket
highlights: A premium event showcasing the best local and international cuisine, wine tasting, and live cooking demonstrations by top chefs.

faq.question: Are kids allowed?
faq.answer: Yes, but wine-tasting is for 18+ only.

faq.question: Do I need to bring cash?
faq.answer: Some vendors accept cashless payments.

faq.question: Is parking available?
faq.answer: Yes, the venue has ample parking.

faq.question: Can I bring my own food?
faq.answer: No, outside food is not allowed.

faq.question: Are tickets refundable?
faq.answer: No, but they are transferable.
